sentences.sentence: He tells me gloomily that he has been called up for army service.
sentences.translation: 他沮丧地告诉我他已经被征召入伍了。

sentences.sentence: Brazilians look gloomily forward to a New Year that even the president admits will be grey and cheerless.
sentences.translation: 巴西民众沮丧地期待着一个连总统都承认将会是阴郁而沉闷的新年。

sentences.sentence: He stared gloomily at the phone.
sentences.translation: 他满脸愁容地盯着电话。
